[A briefe collection or epitomie of all the notable and material things contained in the hystorie of Guicchiardine being verie necessarie for Parliament, councell, treatises, and negotiations.] Guicciardini, Francesco, 1483-1540.
[4], 51 leaves
By T. Purfoote, [London : 1591]
Title taken from caption on B1r; imprint from STC. Leaf A1 blank, except for signature mark on recto. Imperfect; lacks title page, A2. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
